system_summary: This system provides a web application and a command-line interface to interact with Git repositories, using a core engine to process repository data and potentially generate visualizations or 'art', integrating with GitHub for repository access.

components.label: Web Frontend
components.role: Provides the interactive graphical user interface for users to browse, configure, and interact with the system.
components.visual_3d_object: A sleek, glowing rectangular screen displaying a dynamic user interface.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'WEB FRONTEND' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: Backend API
components.role: Serves the web frontend, handles user authentication, manages requests, and orchestrates calls to the core logic and external services.
components.visual_3d_object: A tall, powerful server rack with blinking indicator lights, symbolizing robust processing.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'BACKEND API' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: Repo Artist Core
components.role: Contains the core business logic responsible for analyzing repository data and generating 'art' or processed insights based on defined templates.
components.visual_3d_object: A complex, intricate set of rotating gears and cogs, representing deep processing and generation.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'REPO ARTIST CORE' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: CLI Tool
components.role: Allows power users and developers to interact with the core 'Repo Artist' functionality directly from the command line for scripting or automation.
components.visual_3d_object: A dark terminal window with glowing green command-line text, illustrating direct interaction.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'CLI TOOL' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: GitHub API
components.role: Provides external access to GitHub repositories, user data, and authentication mechanisms, acting as the primary source for repository information.
components.visual_3d_object: A stylized cloud icon with the GitHub Octocat logo subtly integrated, denoting an external cloud service.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'GITHUB API' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: Static/Preview Storage
components.role: Stores static assets, such as generated art previews and other web resources, accessible by both the backend and frontend.
components.visual_3d_object: A secure data vault or a stack of stylized data drives, representing persistent data storage.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'STATIC STORAGE' in bold white sans-serif font.
